code: var _require=require('../constants/productConstants'),PRODUCT_LIST_REQUEST=_require.PRODUCT_LIST_REQUEST,PRODUCT_LIST_SUCCESS=_require.PRODUCT_LIST_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_LIST_FAIL=_require.PRODUCT_LIST_FAIL,PRODUCT_DETAILS_REQUEST=_require.PRODUCT_DETAILS_REQUEST,PRODUCT_DETAILS_SUCCESS=_require.PRODUCT_DETAILS_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_DETAILS_FAIL=_require.PRODUCT_DETAILS_FAIL;export var productListReducer=function productListReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{loading:true,products:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PRODUCT_LIST_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case PRODUCT_LIST_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,products:action.payload};case PRODUCT_LIST_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var productDetailsReducer=function productDetailsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{product:{},loading:true};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PRODUCT_DETAILS_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case PRODUCT_DETAILS_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,product:action.payload};case PRODUCT_DETAILS_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
